trans-unit.source: Defines the asynchronous service contract interface for the WS-Trust 1.3 protocol.
Defines the asynchronous Cancel method for the WS-Trust 1.3 protocol.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> that represents the request message, which contains the RST.
The <xref href="System.AsyncCallback"></xref> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous operation.
An object that contains state information associated with the asynchronous operation.
The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that references the asynchronous operation.
Defines the asynchronous RSTR/Cancel method for the WS-Trust 1.3 protocol.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> that represents the request message, which contains the RST.
The <xref href="System.AsyncCallback"></xref> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous operation.
An object that contains state information associated with the asynchronous operation.
The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that references the asynchronous operation.
Defines the asynchronous Issue method for the WS-Trust 1.3 protocol.

The <xref href="System.AsyncCallback"></xref> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous operation.
An object that contains state information associated with the asynchronous operation.
The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that references the asynchronous operation.
Defines the asynchronous RSTR/Issue method for the WS-Trust 1.3 protocol.

The <xref href="System.AsyncCallback"></xref> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous operation.
An object that contains state information associated with the asynchronous operation.
The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that references the asynchronous operation.

The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that references the asynchronous operation.
Defines the asynchronous RSTR/Renew method for the WS-Trust 1.3 protocol.

The <xref href="System.AsyncCallback"></xref> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous operation.

The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that references the asynchronous operation.
Defines the asynchronous Validate method for the WS-Trust 1.3 protocol.

Defines the asynchronous RSTR/Validate method for the WS-Trust 1.3 protocol.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> that represents the request message, which contains the RST.
The <xref href="System.AsyncCallback"></xref> delegate that receives notification of the completion of the asynchronous operation.
An object that contains state information associated with the asynchronous operation.
The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that references the asynchronous operation.
Completes the asynchronous Cancel method.

The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that is returned by a call to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13AsyncContract.BeginTrust13Cancel(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref> method.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> that represents the response message, which contains the RSTR.
Completes the asynchronous RSTR/Cancel method.

The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that is returned by a call to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13AsyncContract.BeginTrust13CancelResponse(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref> method.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> that represents the response message, which contains the RSTR.
Completes the asynchronous Issue method.

The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that is returned by a call to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13AsyncContract.BeginTrust13Issue(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref> method.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> that represents the response message, which contains the RSTR.
Completes the asynchronous RSTR/Issue method.

The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that is returned by a call to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13AsyncContract.BeginTrust13IssueResponse(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref> method.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> that represents the response message, which contains the RSTR.
Completes the asynchronous Renew method.

The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that is returned by a call to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13AsyncContract.BeginTrust13Renew(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref> method.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> that represents the response message, which contains the RSTR.

A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> that represents the response message, which contains the RSTR.
Completes the asynchronous Validate method.

The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that is returned by a call to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13AsyncContract.BeginTrust13Validate(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref> method.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> that represents the response message, which contains the RSTR.

The <xref href="System.IAsyncResult"></xref> that is returned by a call to the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.IWSTrust13AsyncContract.BeginTrust13ValidateResponse(System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)"></xref> method.
A <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message"></xref> that represents the response message, which contains the RSTR.
